Name: Zeus
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Zeus’s Lightning Bolt.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.
Whenever an attack targets this model in the Ranged Combat Step the attacking model must subtract 2 from its hit rolls.

Spells.Name: The Lord of Lightning (40)
Spells.Effect: Roll a D6 for each enemy Formation within 36” of this model. On a roll of 4+ that Formation suffers 6 Ethereal Damage and models in that Formation must subtract 1 from their hit rolls until the end of the round.
